<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711P T7C4D8 A Mfg 2012 PanelView Plus 6 700 512 MB Read | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T7C4D8 PanelView Plus 6 700 Color Terminal, 6.5-inch, Touchscreen, Standard Communications (Ethernet & RS-232), 512 MB Flash, 512 MB RAM, Windows CE 6.0 without extended features/file viewers, 24V DC Power, Series A
miscellaneous: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T7C4D8 PanelView Plus 6 700 Color Terminal Terminals give operators a clear view into monitoring and controlling applications. With FactoryTalk View Machine Edition already installed and activated, development time is reduced. The 2711P-T7C4D8 Terminal offers: Premier integration with Integrated Architecture; Real-time monitoring of a terminal's displays from a web browser; Common development software; 6.5-inch display with a touch screen for input.
specifications: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T7C4D8 PanelView Plus 6 700 Color Terminal, Display Description: Color Active Matrix TFT; Display Size: 6.5 in.; Resolution: 640 x 480 18-bit Color Graphics; Touch Screen: 8-wire Analog Resistive, Actuation - 1 million presses; OS: Windows CE 6.0 w/o extended features/file viewers; Application Software: FactoryTalk View ME, FT ViewPoint 1.2 or later; Communication Ports: Ethernet (10/100 Mbps, Auto-MDI/MDI-X), RS-232, (2) USB host, (1) USB device; Input Voltage: 18-32V DC (24V Nom.).
